Articles.Content: Okay I'll just say that where he usually is because he is having a coffee at the astronaut complex. So for me jeb spent a lot of time on minmus chilling in a lander that ran out of fuel around 1km above surface level and crashed down but somehow he survived as I tried hard to reduce the impact. Jeb also spent some time on a space station just cause I could as he was having a "vacation" but when he was having "lunch" with his friend mitfred a docking port came into view and I just took jeb and 2 more astronauts and sped away.

He's on my Minmus outpost on one of the flats with a load of scientists/Engineers (was a contract). Preparing the area for a mining/refuelling station which will be brought along with my interplanetary ship . And hopefully will board the ship before it heads off to Duna.
Jeb never leaves the pilots lounge. He sits there all the time drinking martinis and listening to all the other kerbals talk about going to space.
He is in orbit on a spaceplane wating to return to kerbin after sending a new module for my orbital station
My Jeb is on an escape trajectory out of the sun

.

Edited August 19, 2020 by SurrealShock

Um... On kerbin escape trajectory because he ran out of fuel during a mun fly by and is now almost out of snacks and I'm not doing anything because he's Jeb and he should be able to save himself (and Bill and Dunwel)

Edited March 19, 2016 by max_creative
Sorry if I necrothreaded this, but it's only from February right?

On a new save I just started where I decided to revisit pure stock, my Jeb is now fertilizing the grassy plains of Kerbafrica because in a fit of ADHD, I "briefly" alt-tabbed to check something "for just a sec" while his capsule was preparing for re-entry after a Munar orbital mission. That "sec" turned into fifteen minutes, and since I run with sound muted... well...

Edited March 19, 2016 by jonrd463

Dead. R.I.P

 

However this is only in my mess around testing-y save, which is currently my only save given I'm on a pre 1.1 hiatus

On February 21, 2016 at 9:15 PM, SurrealShock said:

Oh pbbbbb he is um... well um... So how is the weather? (Casual subject change)

Explaining the joke just makes it less funny, the KSP forums isn't populated with inept people.

My Jeb is currently at home, probably eating crumpets with tea, awaiting a Duna transfer window.

Edited March 19, 2016 by LetsGoToMars!
He died when i bolted a crew capsule on a SRB. Well he at least died for science!
And now Jeb is enjoying his tea and crumpets on his luxurious Dunan homestead, with a few other random kerbals to keep him company.

On 3/19/2016 at 0:48 PM, Markush100 said:

He died when i bolted a crew capsule on a SRB. Well he at least died for science!

Markush100, meet Quicksave. Quicksave, meet Markush100. I'm sure the two of you will get along famously.......

(srsly, don't let me catch you killing Jebediah ever again!)

My Jebediah is at Arclight Station orbiting Minmus, doing initial prep for my Career-mode mission to Duna. The flagship is incoming in six hours game time; Jebediah will be taking the helm, along with twelve other Kerbonauts and seven tourists, for a mission that will earn a cool two million in contracts and get thirteen Kerbals that third star.

I just killed him - again

 

Trying for my second Mun landing and came in too hot.

Edited March 22, 2016 by Draco T stand-up guy

4 hours ago, GeneralVeers said:

Markush100, meet Quicksave. Quicksave, meet Markush100. I'm sure the two of you will get along famously.......

Hey! Its not my fault! The engineers forgot to add a parachute! And whats this "Quiek Seiv" You are talking about. Cant seem to find the button in mission control!?
MY JEB IS AT THE CRUPTID BUNKER DO TO CRUPTED GAME

Jeb and Val are both five star pilots now, and effectively sitting at the astronaut complex in retirement. They only get used if all other pilots are already busy.

I hate to risk them on experimental stuff, so lesser pilots get assigned.

I hate wasting experience on them, so lesser pilots get assigned.

Mine is on Minmus, having spent almost all of his 300 day career on the base. The whole crew is overdue for a rotation, and Jebediah will soon be back home, ready for the upcoming Duna mission.

Meanwhile, in an alternate reality, Jeb's remains are spread thinly through the western mountains. Some distance away, the ripped, burnt parachute lies on the rocks. We will remember. :'(

On 3/19/2016 at 2:48 PM, Markush100 said:

He died when i bolted a crew capsule on a SRB. Well he at least died for science!

I've done this one too! Except I didn't forget parachutes.  I wanted to get a crew report contract done quickly and cheaply, so I rolled out the starting command pod on a BACC booster.  There was only about 1 second in between "heat warning bar appears" and "ship spontaneously combusts"
I left Jeb adrift in the silent eternal tranquility that is Donald Trump's toupee

In my Science and Career games, idling between missions.

In my main game in sandbox, dead since my very first launch because I used liquid fuel fuselages instead of LF/O tanks, so only the Flea boosters fired, and then I found out what happens when the parachute icons are red... Bill, Bob, and Valentina suffered similar fates during attempts to make my first orbit.

This one? currently???

 

Alive and well.... the first suicide mission that comes up, he *will* step forward....

 

 

15 hours ago, Markush100 said:

Hey! Its not my fault! The engineers forgot to add a parachute! And whats this "Quiek Seiv" You are talking about. Cant seem to find the button in mission control!?

quick save, push F5 I think it is, saves your game .... at most times.... like when just before Jeb explodes.....
On the Mun waiting for flags to be planted.

Well, that didn't go as planned....

Was aiming for Minmus but a confluence of TimeWarp and gravity swings around Mun and Jeb finds himself in solar orbit

I'm still wondering if I should leave him there, revert launch or swing around some of the inner planets. He's got plenty of fuel but limited science.
neo copy new jeb he is in the astronot complecx chelon and wating to test a new veicle
